document.full_text: scientists probing the deadly e. coli strain in europe are finding the bacteria combines a highly poisonous, but common, toxin with a rarely seen "glue" that binds it to a patient's intestines.
document.title: deadly e. coli mixes common toxin with rare "glue"
lines_and_colors: scientists probing the deadly e. coli strain in europe are finding the bacteria combines a highly poisonous, but common, toxin with a rarely seen "glue" that binds it to a patient's intestines.
